definition: to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
variant of 構|构[gou4]/(Tw) (coll.) variant of 夠|够[gou4]/to reach by stretching
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Since that time, the modern physical geography pattern of China has been basically established.
sentences.chinese: 这次构造运动后基本形成了我国自然地理的现代格局。

sentences.english: The maximum principal axes of the compressive stress in the five tectonic movements are nearly horizontal.
sentences.chinese: 五次构造运动的最大主压应力均呈近水平方向。

sentences.english: Neotectonics was the dominant factor of the environmental evolution of Loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 新构造运动是黄土高原区域环境变迁的主导性因素。

sentences.english: Geomorphic and new tectonic movement are important to mineralization.
sentences.chinese: 地貌与新构造运动在成矿中占有重要地位。

sentences.english: Ordovician carbonates of Tahe oilfield have been reformed by tectonic movements for many times.
sentences.chinese: 塔河油田奥陶系碳酸盐岩经历了多期构造运动的改造。

sentences.english: The investigation of river terraces is an effective way to explain the neotectonic movements.
sentences.chinese: 河流阶地的研究是探索新构造运动的有效方法之一。

sentences.english: The formation of Paleozoic buried hills in Jiyang depression was chiefly controlled by tectonic movement.
sentences.chinese: 济阳坳陷古生界潜山的形成主要受构造运动的控制。

sentences.english: The neotectonic period is the principal metallogenic period of the laterite gold deposits.
sentences.chinese: 新构造运动期是云南红土型金矿的重要成矿期。

sentences.english: The basin has experienced multiphase tectonic movements, leading to the formation of 3 large paleohighs.
sentences.chinese: 台盆区经历了多期构造运动，形成3个大型古隆起。

sentences.english: The neotectonic movement displays four stages of activity.
sentences.chinese: 新构造运动表现有四次活动。

sentences.english: The distribution of hot springs along South China Coast is closely correlated with Neotectonic movements.
sentences.chinese: 华南沿海温泉分布与新构造运动关系密切。

sentences.english: Lunnan low uplift has undergone multistage complex tectonic movement since its formation.
sentences.chinese: 自形成以来，轮南低凸起经历了多期复杂的构造运动。

sentences.english: The vertical mean P axis in the southern part of Fen-Wei Graben indicates tensional tectonic movement there.
sentences.chinese: 汾渭地堑南段平均P轴直立，显示张性构造运动。

sentences.english: Pakistan’s mud volcanoes form as a result of plate tectonic activity.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦泥火山的形成是板块构造运动的结果。

sentences.english: Origin cause of formation its form under the tectonic movement , the west of issue for swallow mountain and sea mainly.
sentences.chinese: 其成因主要为燕山和海西期的构造运动下形成的。

definition: fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
